ViewObject.Name: RevenueVsExpenseVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select CLD_ID CLD_ID, SLOC_ID SLOC_ID, ORG_ID ORG_ID, HO_ORG_ID HO_ORG_ID, PRD_DTL_START_DT PRD_DTL_START_DT, PRD_DTL_END_DT PRD_DTL_END_DT, PER_ID PER_ID, PERIOD_DESC PERIOD_DESC, sum(NVL(REV_AMT_BS,0)) REV_AMT_BS, sum(NVL(EXP_AMT_BS,0)) EXP_AMT_BS from (select D.CLD_ID, D.SLOC_ID, D.ORG_ID, D.HO_ORG_ID, D.ORG_FY_ID, D.STRT_DT PRD_DTL_START_DT, D.END_DT PRD_DTL_END_DT, --decode(A.budget_type,'1','Revenue') REVENUE, --DECODE(V.BUDGET_TYPE,'2','Expenses',3,decode(V.amt_typ,'Dr','Expenses','Cr','Revenue')) EXPENSE, --decode(budget_type, '1', 'Cr', '2', 'Dr', '3', amt_typ) amt_typ, sum(a.ITM_AMT_BS) REV_AMT_BS, sum(V.ITM_AMT_BS) EXP_AMT_BS, D.PER_ID, D.PERIOD_DESC from bdg$fin$budget$prod$prd$dtl a, bdg$fin$budget$prod$prd$dtl V, (SELECT B.CLD_ID, B.ORG_ID, F.ORG_CREATE_REF_SLOC_ID SLOC_ID, NVL(F.ORG_ID_PARENT_L0, F.ORG_ID) HO_ORG_ID, B.ORG_FY_ID, B.PER_ID, B.PERIOD_DESC, B.STRT_DT, B.END_DT FROM FIN.FIN$YEAR_FRQNCY_VW B, (SELECT CLD_ID, SLOC_ID, ORG_ID, DECODE(BDG_METHD,1,'D',2,'W',3,'Q',4,'H',5,'M') PERIOD_TYPE --1 FOR DAILY,2 FOR WEEKLY,3 QUARTERLY ,4 FOR HALFYEARLY, 5 MONTHLY FROM APP.ORG$BDG$PRF) C, APP.ORG F WHERE B.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID AND B.CLD_ID = C.CLD_ID AND B.PERIOD_TYPE = C.PERIOD_TYPE AND B.ORG_ID = F.ORG_ID AND B.CLD_ID = F.ORG_CLD_ID ) D WHERE A.CLD_ID(+) = D.CLD_ID AND A.ORG_ID(+) = D.ORG_ID AND A.PRD_DTL_START_DT(+) = D.STRT_DT AND A.PRD_DTL_END_DT(+) = D.END_DT AND (V.BUDGET_TYPE(+) = 3 OR V.BUDGET_TYPE(+) = 2) AND V.CLD_ID(+) = D.CLD_ID AND V.ORG_ID(+) = D.ORG_ID AND V.PRD_DTL_START_DT(+) = D.STRT_DT AND V.PRD_DTL_END_DT(+) = D.END_DT AND A.budget_type(+) = 1 group by D.CLD_ID, D.SLOC_ID, D.ORG_ID, D.HO_ORG_ID, D.ORG_FY_ID, D.STRT_DT, D.END_DT, a.BUDGET_TYPE, D.PER_ID, D.PERIOD_DESC ) where CLD_ID = :CldIdBind AND SLOC_ID = :SlocIdBind AND ORG_ID = :OrgIdBind AND HO_ORG_ID = :HoOrgIdBind AND ORG_FY_ID = app.fn_get_fy_id( :CldIdBind , :OrgIdBind, sysdate) group by CLD_ID, SLOC_ID, ORG_ID, HO_ORG_ID, PRD_DTL_START_DT, PRD_DTL_END_DT, PER_ID, PERIOD_DESC order by PRD_DTL_START_DT, PRD_DTL_END_DT
